mapper.insert: insert into category(or_code, or_pr_code, or_me_email, or_name, or_date, or_post_code, or_addr, or_addr_datail, or_request, or_amount, or_price, or_total_price, or_state, or_deli, or_point, or_coupon, or_hc_num, or_refund_date) values(#{or_code}, #{or_pr_code}, #{or_me_email}, #{or_name}, #{or_date}, #{or_post_code}, #{or_addr}, #{or_addr_datail}, #{or_request}, #{or_amount}, #{or_price}, #{or_total_price}, #{or_state}, #{or_deli}, #{or_name}, #{or_point}, #{or_coupon}, #{or_hc_num}, #{or_refund_date})
